function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unknown and novel viruses with similar patterns and symptoms may emerge in the future, leading to the possibility of facing another pandemic.","Impact":"Potential widespread transmission and impact on global public health if not addressed.","Mitigation":"Investing in research and technology for rapid identification and containment of novel viruses.","Technologies":"Advanced diagnostic and surveillance systems, genomic sequencing, and bioinformatics.","People":"Global population, public health authorities, and healthcare workers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and government agencies."},{"Description":"Contagious respiratory illnesses pose a persistent threat to global well-being.","Impact":"Potential outbreaks and widespread transmission of respiratory diseases leading to public health crises.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures, early detection, and monitoring of respiratory illnesses.","Technologies":"Smart sensor networks, AI for disease monitoring, and real-time data analytics.","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable individuals.","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies, and technology innovators."}]}
